name: mezon-automation
description: Automation Framework with Playwright + Page Object Model

scripts.test:setup:
npx playwright test --project setup && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:e2e:
npx playwright test --project chromium-no-bdd && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:dual:
npx playwright test --project chromium-dual-user && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:headed:
npx playwright test --headed && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:smoke:
npx playwright test --grep @smoke && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:regression:
npx playwright test --grep @regression && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:chrome:
npx playwright test --project chromium-no-bdd && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.__COMMENTED_BDD_SCRIPTS__: See BDD_SETUP.md for re-enabling BDD functionality
scripts._test:bdd:
npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts._test:all:
npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-no-bdd --project chromium-dual-user --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts._test:bdd:headed: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth --headed
scripts._test:bdd:debug: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth --debug
scripts._test:bdd:ui: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth --ui
scripts._test:bdd:login:
npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts._test:bdd:user:
npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth --grep @user && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.allure:history: npm run allure:preserve-history && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:restore-history
scripts.allure:preserve-history: test -d allure-report/history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-results/ || echo 'No history found'
scripts.allure:restore-history: test -d allure-results/history && echo 'History preserved' || echo 'No history to restore'
scripts.clean: rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/ coverage/ allure-results/ allure-report/

author: Mezon Team
